div.div: Unweighted (black) and abundance weighted cumulative frequency distributions (red: Total catch, green: Juvenile catch, and blue: Adult catch) of sampling-station bottom depths and temperatures for each season.
div.p: Asterisks indicate significant shifts in the abundance-weighted curves relative to sampled depths and temperatures (two-sample Kolmogorov-Smirnov test, * p < 0.05 and *** p < 0.001).
